name: Werewolf Hunter X
description: Werewolf Hunter X is a retro style 2d crafting and survival sandbox game that is currently in development by SeaCreatureSandwich, and boasts unique item building, procedural generation, rogue-like resource scarcity, mythical monsters, static and procedural world design, and much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory Storage: 500 MB available space
